Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Westbound  Reroute near Madison/Clark
ShortDescription: Westbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Clark, Adams, LaSalle, due to police activity near Madison/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Clark, Adams, LaSalle, then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to police activity near Madison/Clark.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute at Devon/Leavitt
ShortDescription: #155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Devon, Western, Pratt, Ridge, due to police activity near Devon/Leavitt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Devon, Western, Pratt, Ridge, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Devon/Leavitt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted NB: Jackson, LaSalle, Monroe and Dearborn, SB: Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams near Jackson/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Dearborn due to police activity near Jackson/Dearborn.

Northbound buses will operate via Jackson, Lasalle, Monroe and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Adams, State, Madison, Clark and Adams.

Allow extra travel time.
